articles.author: Laura Dobberstein
articles.title: Decade old patent suit goes Apple's way - The Register
articles.description: But wait! There could be more litigation as VirnetX isn't giving up yet
articles.content: On Thursday an appeals court upheld a ruling in favor of Apple, in a $503 million patent case with Nevada-based security software and technology vendor VirnetX that has been ongoing for thirteen year… [+2075 chars]
